text:
```import ssl
print(ssl.OPENSSL_VERSION)```
what you got?

According the announcement, TLS 1.0 should not be rejected until Dec 1st. <https://forum.developer.betfair.com/forum/developer-program/announcements/33563-tls-1-0-no-longer-supported-from-1st-december-all-betfair-api-endpoints>

attachments.title: TLS 1.0 - No Longer Supported from 1st December - All Betfair API Endpoints -              Developer Program Forum
attachments.text: Please be aware that from 1st December requests to all Betfair Exchange endpoints will no longer support the TLS 1.0 security protocol Following the previous update relating to TLS support for Login (<https://forum.developer.betfair.com/forum/developer-program/announcements/27206-betfair-api-login-tls-1-2-from-19th-february>
attachments.fallback: Developer Program Forum:               TLS 1.0 - No Longer Supported from 1st December - All Betfair API Endpoints -              Developer Program Forum
